Description.Text:
Position The hotel is situated in Marebello, only a few minutes from the beach.
Restaurant Air-conditioned restaurant with a sea view.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Last refurbishment in 2010. Sweet buffet breakfast.
Meals: SUMMER PERIOD (from 24/05/14 to 27/09/14) at lunch and dinner choice between 2 menus with vegetable buffet and fruit or dessert; WINTER PERIOD (from 29/09/13 to 23/05/14) at dinner fixed menu with 3 courses, fruit or dessert.
For who books ALL INCLUSIVE treatment: 1/4 l. wine + 1/2 l. water per person per meal + beach service with 1 sun umbrella + 2 sun beds per room (in single room 1 sun umbrella + 1 sun bed).
Check IN from (midday). Check OUT until 10.00 am.
